alert.note: Alert for Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 20 at 2:10PM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 9 AM until 5 PM Tuesday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222, 225, 229 and 230 which includes Teller and Fremont counties, the Wets and Sangre De Cristo mountains and the southern I-25 corridor of Huerfano and western Las Animas counties... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Wednesday morning through afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 222 and 229 which includes Fremont and Huerfano counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...225 AND 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 9 AM to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...225 and 230. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
